original_title: Sri Lanka rupee weakens at 301.00/302.05 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 301.00/302.05 to the US dollar in the spot forex market on Tuesday, from 299.00/10 on Tuesday, dealers said. Bond yields were broadly steady.
A bond maturing on 15.12.2026 closed stable at 11.30/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 11.90/12.05 percent up from 11.95/12.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.12.2028 closed at 12.10/20 percent down from 12.10/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2031 closed at 12.30/50 percent. (Colombo/Apr17/2024)
